p: Cell sorting and flow cytometry experiments were performed at the Garvan Institute Flow Cytometry Facility. Flow cytometry was performed on a Becton Dickinson CantoII or LSRII SORP flow cytometer using BD FACSDIVA software, and the results were analyzed using Flowjo software (Tree Star Inc.). FACS experiments were performed on a FACS AriaII sorter using the BD FACSorter software. Full details of each commercial antibody used for flow cytometry and immunochemistry are described in Supplementary TableÂ 3.
